content:
Hi!

I'm Ana (Hoverbear) from the TiKV Project! You can ask me you'd like to connect with our team about our distributed transactional key-value store that's in Rust. We're part of the CNCF. We tend to focus on ultra-large scale systems (eg injesting 13 TB/day) and we have some expertise in the area. Currently some of our big problems are dealing with compile time bloat and working with some of our FFI bindings.

We publish crates like grpc-rs, raft-rs, fail-rs, and rust-prometheus. If you'd like to get involved directly with our projects, or use them in your own, we'd love to help you out.

Otherwise, I'll try to keep an eye on this channel and make any connections or comments that I feel I can! We think Rust is the best language for our project and we want to help. :)
